message:
Hundreds of off-duty police officers and deputies joined protests today against Gov. Scott Walker's budget repair bill that would strip most collective bargaining powers from about 170,000 public employees.

‎"Police, state troopers & firefighters are exempt from Walker's proposal, but even as some marched on the downtown Capitol Square, hundreds of other officers from around the state provided security... They came equipped with riot gear, including helmets & batons..."

http://www.usatoday.com/news/nation/2011-02-26-wisconsin-officers_N.htm
